Message:
To me, my mother
was my role model.

Whenever something
bad happened,
everyone in our village
always came to her for help.

Because they knew that
no matter what the problem was,
she’d always find a way to fix it.

Knowing how much
her people depended on her,
my mother made sure that
no one was left unheard.

All the hard work she always
did for everyone naturally
made her the talk of the village.

Ever since I was young,
my grandmother would
always say, “Learn from
your mother, Matilda.”

Learn from the great Queen,
loved and trusted by all—
